hero.title: The
hero.subtitle: Experience the next generation of coding challenges with AI-driven analysis, real-time multiplayer battles, and our unique BrainType cognitive ranking system.

features.title: A New Arena for Coders
features.subtitle: ConJudge is engineered from the ground up to provide a dynamic and insightful competitive programming experience. Our platform isn't just about finding the right answer; it's about understanding how you get there.

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Driven Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Get deep insights into your code's performance, complexity, and style. Our AI provides personalized feedback to help you identify weaknesses and refine your problem-solving techniques.

realTimeBattles.title: Real-Time Battles
realTimeBattles.description: Engage in exciting, live, head-to-head coding duels. Test your speed and accuracy against peers in a fast-paced environment that simulates real-world competitive pressure.

dynamicDifficulty.title: Dynamic Difficulty
dynamicDifficulty.description: Our system adapts to you. Face challenges that are perfectly tuned to your personal skill level, ensuring you're always engaged and learning, never overwhelmed or bored.

automatedProblems.title: Automated Problems
automatedProblems.description: Never run out of challenges. Our platform generates a limitless supply of unique, high-quality problems across various domains, ensuring fresh content is always available.

brainTypeRanking.title: BrainType Ranking
brainTypeRanking.description: Go beyond simple ratings. Our proprietary BrainType system analyzes your problem-solving patterns to identify your cognitive strengths and weaknesses as a programmer.

communityDriven.title: Community Driven
communityDriven.description: Join a vibrant community of passionate programmers. Collaborate, discuss solutions, participate in forums, and learn from the collective knowledge of your peers.

mission.title: Our Mission: Beyond Ranks and Ratings
mission.description: We believe competitive programming is more than just a sport; it's a powerful tool for cognitive development. ConJudge was created to shift the focus from pure rankings to a deeper understanding of one's own problem-solving mind. Our mission is to provide a platform that not only challenges programmers but also empowers them with self-awareness, helping them grow into more effective, insightful, and adaptable thinkers.

cta.title: Ready to Redefine Your Limits? Join Now.
cta.subtitle: Sign up today to start your journey and discover your BrainType.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Login to your account to continue

braintype.title: BrainType — Cognitive Analysis System
braintype.subtitle: ConJudge analyzes not just results, but thinking patterns.
braintype.description: AI learns each user's coding behavior and evaluates parameters such as:
braintype.result: As a result, everyone gets a unique brain profile. This profile plays a key role in shaping future training plans.

battles.title: Real-Time Coding Battles
battles.subtitle: ConJudge turns programming into a live competition, not just passing tests.
battles.startBattleDesc: Compete with rivals by writing code in real-time!
battles.description: During the battle, the user can see the opponent's progress, and AI provides extensive analysis after the competition.

problems.title: Problems
problems.dynamicDesc: In ConJudge, problem difficulty is not fixed. The system recalculates difficulty daily based on real results.
problems.aiGeneratorDesc: A special AI system within the platform can automatically generate new problems:
problems.generatorNote: Only administrator approval is required. This system turns ConJudge into a dynamically expanding platform with unlimited content.

school.title: School Mode — Your Own OJ System
school.subtitle: ConJudge presents a special SaaS module for schools and educational institutions.
school.description: Every school can build its own online judge system:
school.conclusion: This feature turns ConJudge not only into an individual competition platform but also into a complete educational product.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.spamNote: Don't forget to check your spam folder.

resetPasswordPage.title: New Password
resetPasswordPage.successDesc: You can now login with your new password.
resetPasswordPage.error: Error occurred. Link might be expired.
